

I AM HERE index
sidebox: 

Explain 
select * from zen_ezpages where status_footer = 1 and footer_sort_order > 0 order by footer_sort_order, pages_title;



I AM HERE index
sidebox: 

Explain 
select count(*) as total
              from zen_sessions
              where sesskey = 'e4tq2ot1hp4crur7n4c9qndnp6';
